Title: A new story
Publisher: Shandong renmin chunbanshe (山东人民出版社)
Notes: Propagandist performing a story in the field, with percussion, to children and a senior, while the adults are working in the fields. Subject is the fall of Jiang Qing, based on the legendary story of Monkey (Journey to the West); Jiang Qing is pictured as the White Bone Demon, who is defeated by Monkey.
